name: @nstudio/nativescript-snackbar
description: A NativeScript plugin for the Material Design SnackBar.

scripts.ci.ios.setup: sudo pip install --upgrade pip && sudo pip install six echo no | npm i -g nativescript && tns usage-reporting disable && tns error-reporting disable
scripts.ci.android.setup: echo no | npm i -g nativescript && tns usage-reporting disable && tns error-reporting disable
scripts.ci.ng.android.build: npm pack && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @nstudio/nativescript-snackbar && tns plugin add ../src/nstudio-nativescript-snackbar-1.1.1.tgz && tns build android --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.ci.ng.ios.build: npm pack && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @nstudio/nativescript-snackbar && tns plugin add ../src/nstudio-nativescript-snackbar-1.1.1.tgz && tns build ios --env.aot --env.uglify
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
